Name: Light'em Up
Descriptions: You have gone back in time, and witnessed the lack of powerful technology that exists today. Design brilliant circuits with the most basic of equipment lying around, using just your knowledge from the future.
Rules: Maximum of two members are allowed
Number of stages will be decided according to number of participants
Elimination will be done after each stage
Points will be based on result, speed, neatness and simplicity of the circuit
Mobile phones, calculators and other electronic gadgets are strictly prohibited inside the hall
External advices during the event are not permitted
The supply is to be given only after informing the event members
Contestants are only supposed to use the items provided to them but should carry screw drivers and testers, which will not be provided for the event
Maximum time for completing the connection for a group is 45 minutes
All students with a valid identity card from their respective educational institution and a valid DYUKSHA ID are eligible to participate in the event
Decision of organizers will be ﬁnal and binding on all
The organizers have full rights to call off the event if the required number of entries are not met, if that is the case the registered participants will be informed at the earliest
Change in rules, if any will be highlighted on the website and notiﬁed to the registered teams
